human being on this

atrocities that were perpetrated
how could it not break your
heart
but make no

a reflection of weakness or
Retreat The Secret of Jewish

replicate that we are an eternal
people we're here for 3,800 years
standing unbroken
chain is
because we were faced with every
possible enemy we knew how to look at

the
Abyss we did everything possible to

we were defined by our calling our

secret
Hamas just like

T were

whatever little do they know as hmon

gave birth to the Eternal hope that we

History
spawning every great contribution who

back to

morality we brought morality to this

captured all that tragedy and I said to

photo
album of his children his grandchildren
his great-grandchildren
I think we all understand what that
